name: redux-saga-coon
description: Redux State leaking with the help of redux-saga

scripts.build:umd:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack lib/index.js dist/redux-saga-coon.js --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build:umd:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack lib/index.js dist/redux-saga-coon.min.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build: rimraf dist es && npm run build:umd:dev && npm run build:umd:prod && npm run build:es
scripts.prepublish: npm run check && npm run compile && npm run build

author: Sosick Studios <bryce@sosickstudios.com>
